version_description: Access our Qbank directly from the main navigation bar at the bottom of your Lecturio app. Qbanks available are USMLE Step 1 and MBBS (MBChB).

Hi there, we have dramatically improved our app compatibility. Now, your app is optimized for your iPhone X and you can use your app in portrait mode on your iPad. Furthermore you can access our brand new support forum directly via your app.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to Lecturio. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Bug fixes
Hi there, we extended your Qbank with brand new features. Update your app now and review all your previous tests or repeat every single test again.
Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to Lecturio. Update your app now to get all the new features.
Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to Lecturio. Update your app now to get all the new features.

Lecturio’s QUESTION OF THE DAY is finally here!

Update your Lecturio app now to explore your Question-of-the-Day feature on your brand-new Home Screen. Get one board-style question for free every day, including explanations for correct & incorrect answers. What else is new? The Home Screen shows you recommended video lectures and allows you to continue where you left off. Start now!
Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to Lecturio. Update your app now to get all the new features.
Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to Lecturio. Update your app now to get all the new features.
Hi there, now our videos supporting closed captions. Download your latest app update to learn on the train or in airplane without headphones.
Hi there, don’t want to start the next lecture yourself? Now you can sit back and relax while the next video starts playing automatically.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to Lecturio. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- bugfix for lecture download without closed captions
Hello everyone, from now on you can add your own courses and lectures to your study planner. This allows you to track the status of your learning goal.
Hello everyone, from now on you can reset your quiz progress in your Spaced Repetition overview. In addition, we fixed a bug where the Question of the Day notification was not displayed.
Hello everyone, from now on it is possible to remove content from the study planner.
Hello everyone, we have improved the learning path feature.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Bugfix: When adding a course or lecture to the study planner in the article tab
- Bugfix: Quiz overview was not updated
- Bugfix: Lecture quiz was not opened correctly at the end of the lecture

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Feature: We have added another option in the settings to report specific feedback and bugs.
- Feature: In addition, users can now enable the automatic sending of crash reports.
- Bug fix: The heading of the learning path card does not break into a second line.
- Bug fix: The study planner due date picker incorrectly displayed the time estimate input for individual lectures.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Feature: Learning objectives have been added to the video lectures.
- Bug Fix: Study Planner Card on the home screen did not disappear when all tasks were removed.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Feature: Study Planner tasks can now also be removed directly from course and lecture pages.
- Bug Fix: Deleting an empty bookmark list caused a crash.
- Bug Fix: The permissions for Google Cast changed in iOS 14.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Bug fix: Cards on the lecture page are reloaded on device rotation.
- Feature: A warning is displayed if users edit the Study Planner while they are offline.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Feature: The selected Qbank will no longer be changed by the selected video library.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Bugfix: Black screen during app launch.
- Bugfix: Qbank full screen mode is exited when using automatic translation.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Bug Fixes: Text formatting and badges were missing in some places in the study planner.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Hotfix: User was not able to login after app update.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Feature: Exam preparation is now also available in the Study Planner.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Enhancement: The due date of the study planner now also shows the time
Hello, we have completely revised the navigation. From now on you will find the app settings in the "More" area. Bookmatcher and Search can be opened via Home.

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Feature: You can now filter and sort your Study Planner tasks

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- small bug fixes

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
Feature: App supports deep linking

Hello there, we're always making changes and improvements to our app. Update your app now to get all the new features.
- Feature: We have added a new overview of all notes that have been created
